powers.title: Dagger
powers.description: A shiny steal dagger. Looks ready for violence.

powers.title: Crowbar
powers.description: Smashes things, pries things open.

powers.title: Longsword
powers.description: Regular sword. Deals 4 damage.

powers.title: Obsidian Sword
powers.description: A pitch black sword. Deals 6 damage, adds bonus dice to your attack rolls.

powers.title: Light Bow
powers.description: A small and light bow.

powers.title: Light Crossbow
powers.description: A small and light crossbow.

powers.title: Throwing Dagger
powers.description: Angular black throwing dagger.

powers.title: Slingshot
powers.description: Shoots a small projectile(like a pebble). Deals 3 damage.

powers.title: Blunderbuss
powers.description: Old-timey Gun. Takes a minute to reload.

powers.title: Leather Armor
powers.description: Basic armor. Increases you max HP by 3 points.

powers.title: Ninja Armor
powers.description: Suit made out of light black clothes. Increases you max HP by 3 points. Makes you very hard to notice in the dark.

powers.title: Steel Armor
powers.description: Increases your max HP by 6 points.

powers.title: Obsidian Armor
powers.description: Increases your max HP by 8 points.

powers.title: Grappling Hook Gun
powers.description: Shoots the grappling hook to the distance of up to 50 meters, reels it back in.

powers.title: Bear Trap
powers.description: Perfect for setting traps (not just for bears).

powers.title: Rope
powers.description: Regular piece of 50ft rope.

powers.title: 10 foot pole
powers.description: A regular 10 foot pole. Useful whenever you need a 10 foot pole.

powers.title: Torches
powers.description: Provide light. Set things on fire.

powers.title: Spyglass
powers.description: Helps you see farther.

powers.title: Waterskin
powers.description: Holds liquids.

powers.title: Ball Bearings
powers.description: Great for setting traps for the enemies.

powers.title: Shovel
powers.description: You know, digging stuff.

powers.title: Glider
powers.description: Artificial wings you can use for gliding.

powers.title: [Custom Title]
powers.description: [Create and edit this card if you need to create a custom one]
